## Source: amazon-inspector (cedde339d72e05699d5f33d7c16779f926f419baded72d7cd78d2610395cc807)
The package com.unity.sharp-zip-lib was found to contain malicious code.

## Source: ossf-package-analysis (1f15cf000a290723f21168be44fd34314f93140d0c57acfa9450d995112139b5)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'com.unity.sharp-zip-lib' @ 9.1.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
